input.sentences: i went to this little arts and craft fair that my city was hosting .
people could sign up and learn how to make these really cool flower designs .
this was how mine ended up turning out .
we then started to put them all together on different black boards to make bigger pieces of art .
here was the finished product of one of the boards .
output.sentences: They were hosting a craft fair.
There were peole who wanted to sign up to learn to do crafts.
This piece of artwork is mine.
We started to put together different pieces to create one board.
This is the finished product of all the boards after they were put together.
